actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific

official_title: Recognizing the positive steps and achievements of the Republic of India and the Islamic Republic of Pakistan to foster peaceful relations between the two nations.

summary.text: Recognizes the significance and importance of the Lahore Declaration (signed by the Prime Ministers of the Republic of India and the Islamic Republic of Pakistan on February 22, 1999) as a step toward durable peace and the development of harmonious relations and friendly cooperation between India and Pakistan. Supports the commitment of such nations to universal nuclear disarmament, non-proliferation, and peaceful regional relations.

titles.title: Recognizing the positive steps and achievements of the Republic of India and the Islamic Republic of Pakistan to foster peaceful relations between the two nations.
